T212 Swaim PSA 2  SOLD
B18 blanket Frank Chance  $64 (email for scan, wouldn't load)

T213-2 Summers PSA 2.5 beautiful card, no creases, small bit of paper missing on back $54

T202 Collins Easily Safe PSA 2.  Three HOFers on this card - Lajoie, Collins and Clarke.  Scan doesn't show it, but there is a crease on Byrne, but hey, he isn't one of the of hall of famers. SOLD
Collins easily safe - arrived safely to its permanent home.  Thanks Mark
